programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP49 Snake Charmer [English Dub]
programme.desc: After several divorces and a couple of deceased husbands, Jacqueline has amassed a fortune and a collection of impressive jewels. In a twist of fate, Lupin and Jacqueline become close... Too close for Jigen and Goemon's comfort. Fujiko, on the other hand, who is after Jacqueline's jewels, gets kidnapped by the Cobra crime syndicate. Blinded by love, will Lupin realize who the true venomous snake is?

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: When Dr. Eggman learns that Knuckles has just discovered the oldest map in the world, which holds the location of the lost continent of Murasia, he sends Decoe and Bocoe on a mission to take the map away from Knuckles.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: Sonic and his friends are in pursuit of Dr. Eggman, who has fled into the volcano which lies at the world's bellybutton. They come upon the Murasians ruin which attributed its destruction to a supposed dragon god.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP49 The Beginning of the End
programme.desc: Dr. Bickley discovers that Sonic's world and theirs were once one and the same. As the two world slowly completes its reunification, she realizes that the process would ultimately cause time to stop. The only solution? Send Sonic and everyone back home.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP50 The Second Time Around, Part One [English Dub]
programme.desc: An illicit auction selling smuggled treasures is taking place. Lupin targets the auction, but is outsmarted by Fujiko, who takes the auction items for herself, as she usually does. In the process, Lupin discovers the auctioneer is Cornelia, the woman he once loved who died saving his life. Has Cornelia really risen from her grave and if so, why?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP51 The Second Time Around, Part Two [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin is reunited with Cornelia, a woman who died by her father's hands to save Lupin's life. However, Cornelia's memories of Lupin have been erased. Her father is Dr. Zel, a Nazi who has succeeded in resurrecting corpses and controlling them. Cornelia is caught between the lies her father tells her and her memories of love for Lupin. Will Lupin be able to save Cornelia?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP52 Emmanuelle in Bangkok [English Dub]
programme.desc: Fujiko discovers that the Holy Scripture for Immortality is hidden within the jungles of Thailand. However, Emmanuelle Poirot, a cold-hearted beauty, is after them too. Lupin, love-struck and being manipulated by Emmanuelle, goes to the temple where the Holy Scripture is hidden and takes on the challenge of stealing it. Stuck between two beauties, whom will Lupin get the treasure for?

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: As Chris spends his last day with Sonic while they prepare for their trip home, the President's army colonel decides to act on his own to capture Dr. Eggman.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: Chris is unable to come to terms with the idea of parting with Sonic and decides to run away with Sonic. As the time runs short for Chaos Control to send Sonic back to his world before the two worlds merge, Chris and Sonic say their good byes one last time.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: With everyone back in their home worlds the crisis has been averted, and all seems to be back to normal. Except, no one seems to know where Sonic is. His friends and even Eggman begin to wonder where he might be.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP53 I Melt With You [English Dub]
programme.desc: Fantômas Mark III, grandson of the mysterious master thief and disguise artist Fantômas, who terrorized Europe during his heyday, is plotting to take over the world. He demands that Lupin deliver the world's largest ruby in exchange for Fujiko, whom he is holding captive.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP54 Mercy Mercy Me [English Dub]
programme.desc: The aging Inspector Hanshichi Mikawa, who failed to capture Lupin 10 years ago, is viewed as a nuisance by his peers at the downtown police station. Lupin has announced he'll be stealing the golden Goddess of Mercy statue.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP55 Kooky Kabuki, Part One [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin and his gang have stolen the "36 Views of Mt. Fuji," a famous series of 46 woodblock prints, from the exhibition hall. However, a gang calling itself the Shiranami Five challenges Lupin head-on by stealing one of the prints from him.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: Sonic activates Chaos Control in his battle against Dark Oak, most formidable enemy he's faced thus far, to scatter the Emeralds across the galaxy. Meanwhile, Tails, Amy, and Cream encounter a spaceship that's crash-landed to their planet during a meteor shower.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: Grown up Chris returns to Sonic's world as his young twelve-year-old self, joining Sonic and his friends to stop Metarex from destroying their planet.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: As Sonic continues his journey aboard Blue Typhoon for the Chaos Emerald, they arrive on Planet Secco, a planet that's supposed to be bone dry and yet is now filled with water.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP56 Kooky Kabuki, Part Two [English Dub]
programme.desc: Goemon, siding with the Shiranami Five, challenges Lupin to a one-on-one duel. While Goemon keeps Lupin busy, the Shiranami Five steals the 36 Views, but one of its members, Kikuko Benten, betrays her gang and escapes with the loot.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP57 Alter-Ego Maniac [English Dub]
programme.desc: On a wild whim, Inspector Zenigata swipes a throwing coin owned by his great Edo-era ancestor, Heiji Zenigata while he's viewing the inside of an incredible new safe protected by Professor Hunter's supercomputer.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP58 Getting' Jigen With It [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin and Jigen are after the Droplet of Aurora, a diamond adorning a prima ballerina's tiara. During the heist, Jigen is wounded and in a twist of fate, is saved by Monica, the prima ballerina.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: Sonic and his friends are the guests of honour at a feast for saving the planet. Dr. Eggman, observing the celebration, begins to plot his next scheme to steal away the Chaos Emerald.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: Continuing the search for Chaos Emeralds, Sonic, and soon after Dr. Eggman, heads for Planet Breezy but is faced with an attack from Metarex.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: In pursuit of Metarex who had stolen Planet egg on a jungle planet, Sonic gets thrown down to the planet. Worried Amy, Cosmo, Cream, and Cheese organize a search party in order to find Sonic.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Ichiro Inuyashiki is a boring office worker who looks like an old man. Even after building them a new home, his family is nothing but ungrateful. One day, Inuyashiki is diagnosed with terminal cancer. Out on a walk to clear his head, a UFO crashes into him, and his body is rebuilt into a deadly robot. - He steps in to stop a group of kids from torturing a homeless man when he is knocked unconscious.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Reborn a robot, Inuyashiki finds meaning by saving others. - Meanwhile, high school student Hiro Shishigami has also been reborn a robot. Shishigami has no regard for anybody aside from his best friend and his family, and uses his robot powers to kill indiscriminately. - Contrary to Inuyashiki, he feels alive when he is taking the lives of others. - What happens when these two meet?

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Shishigami is rattled to see Inuyashiki stand up from a blow that should have killed him before flying away. Seeing that, Inuyashiki knows that Shishigami has a robot body just like himself. After this meeting, Inuyashiki studies his abilities, and uses them to save others. Meanwhile, Shishigami confronts a group of delinquents who have been tormenting his best friend Naoyuki Ando.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: When the fully tattooed yakuza criminal Samejima finds a girl he likes, he kidnaps them, drugs them up, and then roughs them up. Fumino was happy. She had a job and a fiance. But one night, Samejima sets his sights on her, and has his men kidnap her. Fumino manages to escape, and runs to her fiance Satoru's house, but Samejima is in hot pursuit. Inuyashiki comes to save them, but gets shot.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Ando is struggling with the fact that his friend Shishigami is responsible for the spree of home invasions. After reading that hospital patients were being cured, Ando theorizes that there is someone else out there with the same powers as Shishigami. Ando lures Inuyashiki by pretending to need help and asks him to stop Shishigami. - Meanwhile, Shishigami learns his mother has terminal cancer.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Shishigami escaped from a dozen officers, but he has become a wanted man in connection to the home invasion spree. With nowhere to go, Shishigami stays with Shion Watanabe, a classmate who has feelings for him. Meanwhile, Inuyashiki learns to use his robot abilities with Ando's help. After seeing Shishigami's mother publicly apologizing on TV, they worry what Shishigami might do next.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: As Shion believed he was innocent, Shishigami confesses to her that his body is a robot and has taken many lives in order to feel alive again. He coldly informs her that he will kill everyone in the country. However, Shion begs Shishigami not to leave her behind. Shion cries as she tells Shishigami that the people he's killed had futures and loved ones, and Shishigami makes a proposition.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: A special forces team bursts in to apprehend Shishigami. Shion and her grandmother are shot in the crossfire, and Shishigami manages to grab them before escaping. After taking them to safety, he wishes Shion a happy life. - One day, Mari sees her father and Ando together. She follows after and sees Inuyashiki fly off into the sky. That night, Shishigami attacks a police station in vengeance.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: As the news reports on Shishigami's attack on the police station, Shishigami hijacks a broadcast signal to publicly declare war on Japan, claiming he will kill 100 people immediately. Ando realizes Shishigami's plans and manages to thwart it with the help of Inuyashiki's power. Undeterred, Shishigami continues his killing, and announces he will kill 1000 tomorrow, devastating Inuyashiki.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: The day after the mass killings in Shinjuku, Shishigami begins dropping airplanes onto the city. After receiving word from Ando, Inuyashiki manages to stop a number of them from crashing. He then notices that Mari is trapped inside a burning building, but Shishigami appears and attacks him. Inuyashiki is desperately trying to make his way over to save Mari, but Shishigami is right on his heels.

programme.title: INUYASHIKI LAST HERO [English Subtitle]
programme.desc: Saving many lives in Shinjuku, Inuyashiki returns home to open up to his family about his robot body. His family accepts him, and they embrace. After losing both arms, Shishigami goes to Ando who condemns him and Shishigami disappears. Inuyashiki finds out a giant meteor is about to hit earth. With the whole world in chaos, Inuyashiki flys towards the meteor to protect his family.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP41 Heroes and Vixens [English Dub]
programme.desc: Kaguya, a beautiful woman, separately asks Lupin, Jigen and Goemon to gather the tears of the Yeti, a mermaid's scale, and the liver of a dragon so she can make a secret potion. Unaware that each of them has been given a task, they travel to the far corners of the earth to find these items. Will Kaguya's beloved prince awake from his sleep?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP42 Cruisin in Drag [English Dub]
programme.desc: A wealthy shipping magnate and also a bachelor, Onabes' final voyage is nothing short of extravagant, with a ship full of beautiful women and fine art. Things go as planned when Lupin infiltrates the ship disguised as a woman, but things get complicated when Onabes falls in love and proposes to Lupin. Will Lady Lupin be walking down the aisle?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP43 Jumpin the Bones [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin is in Hong Kong for a vacation when he is asked to find a woman in return for helping him escape from Inspector Zenigata. Lupin discovers the pickpocket who stole his wallet is the daughter of the woman he is looking for, and in her possession are the archeologically significant bones of the Peking Man. With Fujiko also after the Peking Man, will Lupin be able to add the bones to his private collection?

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: As the President sends in GUN forces to stop Sonic from destroying the Mirror Towers, Dr. Eggman reveals that his Sunshine Balls are secretly brainwashing the citizens to turn against Sonic.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: When Sonic stands Amy up on a date she decides to go out with Sam Speed instead. Meanwhile, Bokkun reactivates a robot named Emerl to free Eggman from jail.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: As Nelson tries to maintain the faltering Thorndyke Industries due to his employees joining the Freedom Movement to emulate Sonic's carefree lifestyle, kitchen appliances begin to cause havoc around town.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP44 Lion, Cheatin' And Stealin [English Dub]
programme.desc: The Sleeping Lion, a statue made of solid gold, is being transported to a museum by a specially armored, airtight car to mark the 50th anniversary of Australia's independence. Lupin steals the armored car together with the statue out from under the Sydney Police's watchful eye, but then discovers that also inside the armored car is a nearly asphyxiated Inspector Zenigata. Will Lupin choose the golden statue over Inspector Zenigata's life?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP45 Diamonds and Minx [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin manages to steal crime boss Mulligan's precious jewels, only have them stolen from him by Fujiko! Mulligan, unaware that Fujiko has his jewels, hires a skilled gunman named Hangman to take them back from Lupin. Showered with Hangman's bullets, Lupin and his gang return fire with rare wine. Meanwhile, Inspector Zenigata is closing in on Lupin. Will Lupin be able to outrun both Hangman and Inspector Zenigata?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP46 The Island of Dr. Derange [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin has been put on auction at the Wanted Club and Dr. Mad places the winning bid. Dr. Mad also purchases Fujiko and Jigen from the Wanted Club's auctions. The three are abandoned on a deserted island with killer cyborgs as part of Dr. Mad's human reconstruction experiment. Can Lupin, Jigen and Fujiko get off the island alive?

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: Eggman is on the loose and everyone is searching for him. While Mr. Stewart investigates Eggman's whereabouts, he is captured along with Chris in Eggman's secret hideout in the sewers.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: The President hosts a tournament with the red Chaos Emerald as the prize to lure Dr. Eggman. It's a heated battle that finds Sonic fighting alongside everyone, even the President himself, but strangely Dr. Eggman has yet to show himself…

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: The battle for the red Chaos Emerald is heating up. As contestants duke it out for the glory and the prize it's Emerl who wins the tournament. But when Emerl receives the emerald, its power forces him to go on a rampage and attack everyone in the stadium.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP47 Crownin' Around [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin has his eyes on the royal family's Imperial State Crown, but thanks to Scotland Yard's Inspector Dover, stealing it won't be easy. After their initial heist fails, Lupin and his gang plan to take the crown on the day of Princess Mary's royal wedding. Will Big Ben chime in Lupin's favour?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP48 Vault Assault [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin announces he's going to steal the betting takes at the Kentucky Derby, but the heist falls short and fails. However, it's all part of the plan. Lupin's main target is really the Metropolitan Bank's underground vault. Will Lupin get past their tight security measures and pull off the heist?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP49 Snake Charmer [English Dub]
programme.desc: After several divorces and a couple of deceased husbands, Jacqueline has amassed a fortune and a collection of impressive jewels. In a twist of fate, Lupin and Jacqueline become close... Too close for Jigen and Goemon's comfort. Fujiko, on the other hand, who is after Jacqueline's jewels, gets kidnapped by the Cobra crime syndicate. Blinded by love, will Lupin realize who the true venomous snake is?

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: When Dr. Eggman learns that Knuckles has just discovered the oldest map in the world, which holds the location of the lost continent of Murasia, he sends Decoe and Bocoe on a mission to take the map away from Knuckles.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.desc: Sonic and his friends are in pursuit of Dr. Eggman, who has fled into the volcano which lies at the world's bellybutton. They come upon the Murasians ruin which attributed its destruction to a supposed dragon god.

programme.title: Sonic X
programme.sub-title: EP49 The Beginning of the End
programme.desc: Dr. Bickley discovers that Sonic's world and theirs were once one and the same. As the two world slowly completes its reunification, she realizes that the process would ultimately cause time to stop. The only solution? Send Sonic and everyone back home.

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP50 The Second Time Around, Part One [English Dub]
programme.desc: An illicit auction selling smuggled treasures is taking place. Lupin targets the auction, but is outsmarted by Fujiko, who takes the auction items for herself, as she usually does. In the process, Lupin discovers the auctioneer is Cornelia, the woman he once loved who died saving his life. Has Cornelia really risen from her grave and if so, why?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP51 The Second Time Around, Part Two [English Dub]
programme.desc: Lupin is reunited with Cornelia, a woman who died by her father's hands to save Lupin's life. However, Cornelia's memories of Lupin have been erased. Her father is Dr. Zel, a Nazi who has succeeded in resurrecting corpses and controlling them. Cornelia is caught between the lies her father tells her and her memories of love for Lupin. Will Lupin be able to save Cornelia?

programme.title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 [English Dub]
programme.sub-title: LUPIN THE 3rd PART 2 -EP52 Emmanuelle in Bangkok [English Dub]
programme.desc: Fujiko discovers that the Holy Scripture for Immortality is hidden within the jungles of Thailand. However, Emmanuelle Poirot, a cold-hearted beauty, is after them too. Lupin, love-struck and being manipulated by Emmanuelle, goes to the temple where the Holy Scripture is hidden and takes on the challenge of stealing it. Stuck between two beauties, whom will Lupin get the treasure for?
